1377160.name: Dragonium
1377160.description:
If a knight picks up a sword, the enemies run in fear. If the magician casts a spell, then the enemies prostrate. Kings and viziers rely on heroes who have been nurtured by peace or war. Once a simple peasant picks up a sickle and smashes the monsters that attacked the village. The famous knight releases the mace from his hands and falls to the ground. Choosing the path, remember the consequences. After all, only reasonable heroes are able to achieve results.

Features:
-Colorful journey combined with epic combat
-Exciting story adventure
-A well-developed system of classes and their roles in the world
-A world filled with surprises and mysteries
-The outcome of the battle depends on the combination of abilities and magical artifacts
-Deep study of the equipment that the hero wears
-Dragons!
